tha-ap534:5.4: jinuttamo → anuttamo (bj, mr); januttamo (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap534:11.2: sattamake muni → ito sattamakehani (bj, pts-vp-pli1); idha saddhādhimutto isi (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap534:31.2: assāsayi → mamāha so (bj); assāsayaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); mamāhasa (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap534:33.1: Punopi → punāpi (si, sya1ed, sya2ed); muni maṁ (mr)
